casebody.data:
STATE
v.
MORGAN and Brunson. No. 284P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Gary R. Govert, Special Deputy Attorney General, M. Lynne Weaver, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of June 2007 by Defendant (Morgan) to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

*537"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
